entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 5.
